segments.text: Ugh, the sink is a total mess with water pouring out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle on the floor is filthy, spreading everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing in it, doesn't she feel the gross wetness?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron's probably getting soaked with dirty dishwater.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids, hands in the cookie jar like animals.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Crumbs falling all over the counterâ€”nasty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tilting, but they're too greedy to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching up, probably covered in who knows what.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All those wet cabinets, molding soon if not cleaned.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The nice garden outside makes the inside sloppiness worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand how unaware everyone is of this disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked up, waiting to be dirtied more.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just revolting in its carelessness.
segments.speaker: PAR
